basic_information.scholarship_name: Angie Debo Award for Scholarship and Civic Engagement

description: This award recognizes the efforts of Dr. Patti Loughlin to inspire, guide, and mentor students in UCOÂ’s Department of History and Geography. All History and Geography undergraduates are eligible for this award, which focuses on academic excellence in combination with a commitment to the betterment of society. Eligibility Requirements History or Geography major Undergraduate students Minimum 2.75 GPA Faculty recommendation including examples of scholarly activity and civic engagement
